summary: Edits Nord race, giving it +10 magicka and stamina and -20 magicka. It also adds a new power \"Voice of Talos\" based on the Blessing, which boosts Shout regeneration by 40% for 60 secs.
descriptionHtml:
Nord Race edited!

New stats: +20 health and +10 stamina, -20 magicka, +15 carry weight
New power: Voice of Talos (-40% shout cooldown)
Removed Battle Cry power

Attributes:
Heavy Armor +10
Two-Handed +10
Block +5
Smithing +5
Speech +5

Things to do list:
-Add voice cooldown power (Done)
-Remove Battle Cry (done)
-Add some starting shouts (Gift from Talos) (Done)
-Make version translated to czech (my native language) (Aborted)
-Shorten the power duration (Done)
This version is beta, report any problems in the comments. 
UPDATE: Once a week
author: thepitchforkoffate
